Confirm.Caption1: This is your seed phrase. Write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place. You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.
Confirm.Caption2: Select each word in the order it was presented to you.
Confirm.Caption3: This is your seed chars. Write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place. You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.
Confirm.Caption4: Please enter the seed chars you have saved.

CreatePassword.Caption: This password will unlock your Metamask wallet only on this service
CreatePassword.Understand: I understand that DeGe cannot recover this password for me.

Reminder.Caption1: Don't risk losing your funds. protect your wallet by saving your Seed phrase in a place you trust. It's the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.
Reminder.Caption3: Write down your seed phrase on a piece of paper and store in a safe place.
Reminder.Risk2: You forget where you put it
Reminder.OtherOption: Other options: Doesn't have to be paper!

SeedType.TwoWays: There are two ways to secure your wallet

Restore.ByProceeding: By proceeding, you agree to these

Login.button_ImportUsingSeedPhrase: Restore your wallet from your  seed
